Enchantmints

Our Story

Enchantmints products are created to convey beauty, whimsy, and goodness. Our Waldorf-inspired products nurture imaginatin, curiosity, gentleness, kiness, and a love of nature.


Our Mission

To create products that provide joy for children and parents alike. When you choose Enchantmints, you know you are bringing all good things into your little one's life. Our products are made with this orginal artwork. While we use technology to complete the development process, all of our products spring from the fully human work of artists.
